entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v5.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Volt Amps Chart by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/167

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v5.0.2...v5.1.0

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v5.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Prometheus Support by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/170
  • Use endpoint /api/v1/metrics
  • Examples are available here

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v5.1.1...v5.2.0

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v5.2.1
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Fixed gauges not being clickable (closes #159)

What's Changed

  • Collapsible grid by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/173

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v5.2.0...v5.2.1

entry.title: New release for PeaNUT: v5.3.0
entry.content:
NEW

  • Users with multiple NUT servers now still working servers if a different server goes down (closes #174)
  • Users can now see a pulse of working servers in settings
  • Empty server page redirects to /settings
  • Settings page has better info on username and password (closes #179)
  • Commands will be hidden if username and password are not present

What's Changed

  • Tailwindcss 4 by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/180
  • Better error handling by @Brandawg93 in https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/pull/177

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Brandawg93/PeaNUT/compare/v5.2.1...v5.3.0
